results.title: Simvastatin and dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate effects against hypoxic pulmonary hypertension are not additive.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Dehydroepiandrosterone_Sulfate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019314 @@@dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate@@@ effects against @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@hypoxic pulmonary hypertension@@@ are not additive.

results.title: [Compound Tinglizi Decoction intervenes COPD-associated pulmonary hypertension through regulation of HMGB1-mediated pyroptosis and immune imbalance].
results.text_hl: Rats in the low, medium, and high-dose Compound Tinglizi Decoction groups were given 4.93, 9.87, and 19.74 g kg~(-1) Compound Tinglizi Decoction by gavage, respectively. Rats in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group were given 1.50 mg kg~(-1) @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ by gavage.

citations.NLM: Wu XC, Liu Y, Bai ZP. [Compound Tinglizi Decoction intervenes COPD-associated pulmonary hypertension through regulation of HMGB1-mediated pyroptosis and immune imbalance]. Zhongguo Zhong Yao Za Zhi. 2023 Jun;48(11):3055-3065. PMID: 37381964

results.title: Innovative Dual Combination Cospray-Dried Rock Inhibitor/l-Carnitine Inhalable Dry Powder Aerosols.
results.text_hl: This study introduces novel cospray-dried (Co-SD) formulations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, a @GENE_NFE2L2 @GENE_4780 @@@Nrf2@@@ activator ROCK inhibitor, with @CHEMICAL_Carnitine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002331 @@@l-carnitine@@@ as molecular mixtures in various molar ratios for targeted pulmonary inhalation aerosol delivery in @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@, optimized for excipient-free dry powder inhalers (DPIs).

citations.NLM: Acosta MF, Encinas-Basurto D, Abrahamson MD, Eedara BB, Hayes D Jr, Fineman JR, Black SM, Mansour HM. Innovative Dual Combination Cospray-Dried Rock Inhibitor/l-Carnitine Inhalable Dry Powder Aerosols. ACS Bio Med Chem Au. 2024 Dec 18;4(6):300-318. PMID: 39712207

results.title: THE MITOCHONDRIAL REDISTRIBUTION OF ENOS IS REGULATED BY AKT1 AND DIMER STATUS.
results.text_hl: Our data demonstrates that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, which decreases the mitochondrial redistribution of @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_4846 @@@eNOS@@@, increased @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_4846 @@@eNOS@@@-@GENE_HSP90AA1 @GENE_3320 @@@hsp90@@@ interactions and enhanced @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_4846 @@@eNOS@@@ dimerization in cultured pulmonary arterial endothelial cells (PAEC) from a lamb model of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@).
